comment: Set unsigned true for ipb_id and ipb_parent_block_id in ipblocks table

columns.name: el_index
columns.comment: In the case of HTTP URLs, this is the URL with any username or password removed, and with the labels in the hostname reversed and converted to lower case which will allow faster searching for all pages with WHERE clause. Note: If PHP's intl extension is enabled/disabled, maintenance/refreshExternallinksIndex.php needs to be run to refresh this field

columns.name: el_index_60
columns.comment: 'el_index' truncated to 60 bytes to allow for sortable queries that aren't supported by a partial index

columns.name: el_to_path
columns.comment: Path to the external link without considering the domain
